mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPT, ESTATE_ID, MONTH_PAY,building_Id, REMARK,substr(NAME, length(NAME)-2, 3) as unit_name
mapper.insert:
insert into BUILDING_NO
ID,
NAME,
DESCRIPT,
ESTATE_ID,
MONTH_PAY,
REMARK,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{estateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{monthPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update BUILDING_NO
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPT = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ESTATE_ID = #{estateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_PAY = #{monthPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update BUILDING_NO set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPT = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESTATE_ID = #{estateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_PAY = #{monthPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_Id=#{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from BUILDING_NO order by cast(substr(name, 1, length(name)-2) as number)
select * from BUILDING_NO where estate_id=#{0} and building_id is not null order by cast(substr(name, 1, length(name)-2) as number)
select * from BUILDING_NO where estate_id=#{0} and name=#{1} order by cast(substr(name, 1, length(name)-2) as number)
mapper.update: update BUILDING_NO set building_id = null where building_id=#{0} and estate_id=#{1}
mapper.select:
select
from building_no where estate_id=#{0} and building_id is null and substr(name,1,length(name)-2) between #{1} and #{2} order by CAST ( substr(name,1,length(name)-2) AS number )
